name: Sacrifice (itch) (whatgum)
description:
This game is a play where you are both the leading actor and audience.

The play is about sacrifice.

But your acting leads to any meaning, message or moral the audience might gleam about sacrifice.

Essentially, this is an art game more about what is being conveyed than the actual content so the more you think the better the game is. 

There are 5 different mini games which each tell a small story of sacrifice.
